subdisciplines.name: Pharmacodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the effects of drugs on the body.

subdisciplines.name: Pharmacokinetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the movement of drugs within the body, including absorption, distribution, metabolism, and elimination.

subdisciplines.name: Structure-Activity Relationships
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between the chemical structure of a drug and its biological activity.
